content:
follow up from the FMG call - here's current status:

FHIR Core - looks on track - QA in progress
FHIR IG: Breast Cancer Data - near done (Chris Moesel)
FHIR IG: Clinical Genomics - near done (Lloyd Mckenzie)
FHIR IG: Healthcare Associated Infection Reports - ready to publish (Sarah Gaunt)
FHIR IG: International Patient Summary - in progress (Rob Hausam)

FHIR IG: LOINC â€“ IVD Test Code (LIVD) Mapping - no information (??)
FHIR IG: Pharmacy; Medication, Release - no information (??)

FHIR IG: Validated Healthcare Directory - postponed (Brian Postlethwaite)
does anyone know anything about LOINC and pharmacy IGs?
I've pinged Melva. Medication is US Medication. Brett is supposed to be maintaining it.
another question: what should the ballot links be?
the general FHIR ballot link will be http://hl7.org/fhir/2018May/ballot-intro.html (which will point to the content currently at http://build.fhir.org/ballot-intro.html
should the 4 normative ballots point to the same location?
or alternatively, they can point to say http://build.fhir.org/ballot-intro.html#infrastructure, but that jumps the background and context
I think all point to the same place
